block.p: BALL CORP., Broomfield, Colo., named R. David Hoover, vice chairman, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds George A. Sissel, who remains chairman.
ENERGIZER HOLDINGS, St. Louis, Mo., named Dan Sescleifer chief financial officer, succeeding Dan Corbin, who has retired. Mr. Sescleifer is a former vice president and treasurer at Solutia.
